item.description:
Realize that this is Father's Day so that some of you
Might want to spend it with your fathers or father figures.

We are going to have another Meet Up for
Those that live in the Bridgeport, Stratford
And Trumbull commuting area.


Where: Ruby Tuesday
5065 Main Street
Trumbull, CT 06611
203 371 6996

www.westfield.com/trumbull/

http://www.westfield....

Take Rt 15.
Get off Exit 48 on to Rt. 111 Newtown Tnpk / Main Street.
Follow signs to the Mall.
Go into the Mall. Veer to the left.
Ruby Tuesdays is between Lord and Taylor
and the construction parking area.

I am sure that some of our members will enjoy
shopping in the Mall after the Meet Up.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: I will be waiting outside of the restaurant by the parking lot enterance, weather permitting.
item.why: Want Great Conversations with Great Topics at a Great Location

group.name: Greater New Haven Unknown Zone Meetup Group

item.name: An Unknown Zone Trumbull Ruby - 6/15
